name: Retro Basket Master
description:
Retro Basket Master is a 🏀 basketball game 🏀 inspired on "Fernando Martin Basket Master" game (Dinamic 1987).

It's a one versus one 🤼 basketball game combining 2D pixelart sprites for players and spectators with 3D objects: ball, basketball hoop, basketball court and tribune.

The game has the following features:

😃 Training mode: play alone throwing the ball or dunking in the basketball hoop.

😃😃 Match mode: play versus another player in the same desktop (no internet multiplayer available). At this moment, there is not any AI created (no bots 🤖).

  • 📒 Match rules: Personal foul, offensive foul, free throws, team fouls penalty (2 free throws), double dribble, goaltending and backcourt violation review.

😃😃 Twenty-one mode: play "21" turn-based game versus another player.

⌨️🎮 Play with keyboard (cursors / WASD) or joystick (generic, PS4, Xbox, Nintendo Switch or PS3 with Mayflash adapter).

🤡👕 Customize your player: write your name, select your face and your cloth and skin color.

🧺️ Customize the court: select a color (blue Amstrad court or wood classical court).

🎥 Replay: pause the game and see your last 10 seconds replay.

🎧 Stereo sound: sound effects will be played on the left or right side according to the side you are playing.

Available in english and spanish.
